name: Badlands National Park
description: The rugged beauty of the Badlands draws visitors from around the world. These striking geologic deposits contain one of the world’s richest fossil beds. Ancient horses and rhinos once roamed here. The park’s 244,000 acres protect an expanse of mixed-grass prairie where bison, bighorn sheep, prairie dogs, and black-footed ferrets live today.
shortDescription: The rugged beauty of the Badlands draws visitors from around the world. These striking geologic deposits contain one of the world’s richest fossil beds. Ancient horses and rhinos once roamed here. The...

operatingHours.description: The park is open to visitors all year with the exception of weather closures.

fees.title: Entrance - Private Vehicle
fees.description: Fee covers the entry of a private vehicle and its occupants for 7 days

fees.title: Entrance - Motorcycle
fees.description: Valid for 7 days. Admits up to 2 private, non-commercial motorcycles with up to 4 total passengers.

fees.title: Entrance - Per Person
fees.description: Fee covers the entry of an individual that is hiking, bicycling, etc... for 7 days

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Sedan
fees.description: Commercial sedan, 1 to 6 passenger capacity. $25 plus $15 per person - 7 days for Original Manifest

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Van
fees.description: Commercial van, 7 to 15 passenger capacity; $50 - 7 days for Original Manifest

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Mini-bus
fees.description: Minibus, 16 to 25 passenger capacity; $60 - 7 days for Original Manifest

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Motor Coach
fees.description: Motorcoach, 26 or more passenger capacity; $150 - 7 days for Original Manifest

climate.weatherDescription: The Badlands weather is variable and unpredictable with temperature extremes ranging from 116° F to -40° F. Summers are hot and dry with occasional violent thunderstorms. Hailstorms and occasional tornadoes can descend on the Badlands with sudden fury. Winters are typically cold with 12 to 24 inches of total snowfall.

images.title: Badlands Storm
images.altText: Layered badlands formations behind fields of green grass under cloudy and billowing clouds.
images.caption: Summer storms are frequently violent and unpredictable.

images.title: Badlands Yellow Mounds
images.altText: The yellow mounds are peaking out of the formations in this photo.
images.caption: The yellow mounds are peaking out of the formations in this photo.

images.title: Badlands Rugged Peaks
images.altText: Badlands formations are very rugged and often have sharp peaks.
images.caption: Badlands formations are very rugged and often have sharp peaks.

images.title: Clover Landscape
images.altText: Jagged badlands buttes extended in horizon amid yellow flowers under a blue sky.
images.caption: The park has seasonal changes in colors so plan ahead!

images.title: Badlands in the Winter
images.altText: road leading between snow covered badlands formations
images.caption: Winter in Badlands National Park often creates snow covered wonderlands throughout the park.
